author: Kate Ng, Kate Ng
title: Coronavirus: Lockdowns can't end until Covid-19 vaccine found, study says
description: Researchers said their findings are critical for countries in early stages of similar lockdown
content:
A new study based on Chinas coronavirus trajectory has warned that countries wanting to lift lockdown restrictions and let life return to normal should maintain movement control measures until a vaccine against the virus becomes available.
